ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] (OT) Jordan books (was jhenders' .sig)
ygData.msgSnippet: Far as I know, the rasfwrj sponsored FAQ is only up to date as of the release of the last book.  Havent had time to keep up with the group as of late, but I
ygData.messageBody:
Far as I know, the rasfwrj sponsored FAQ is only up to date as of the
release of the last book. Havent had time to keep up with the group
as of late, but I have seen that date thrown around. That does seem
rather short, but I haven't really looked to see if the length had
been discussed either. Man, if its that short, it had better have a
whole hell of a lot of content squished in there. I'm having
withdrawls man! =)

Robynn Merrilin, E'ci, 45, yadda yadda yadda

--
Katy Westerman
katy-w@...
Don't lick something unless you really mean it.
-Advice from the Naked Dancing Llama

>625 pages??
>
>That's not a Jordan book, it's a short story.
>
>You might want to take this with a grain of salt, as the Jordan
newsgroup
>FAQs don't list a definite date. In fact, they quote a TOR books rep
as
>saying they don't even have a manuscript yet. On the other hand, that
may be
>outdated info...
>
>Sorry to continue the off topic thread.
>
>Aranlas Starchaser
